459490.name: NO THING - Soundtrack
459490.description:
Soundtrack of NO THING game.
The year is 1994 and it is the future.

Tracklist:

DISC 01:
01. Simplest Clerk (2:40)
02. The City Is Not Sleeping (2:41)
03. Stand In Line For Happiness (3:44)
04. In Room 22 (3:28)
05. Dark Forest (2:47)
06. Alone Without Smile (3:21)
07. The Neighbours Are Eating Dinner (3:30)
08. Something Wrong In You (3:29)
09. The Factories Are Working (1:20)
10. Everything Is Fine (2:28)
11. The Year Is 1994 (3:52)
12. And It Is The Future (3:20)
13. You Will Meet Her (3:20)
14. In The Castle Made Of Ice (3:13)
15. NO THING BONUS: Five AM (4:24)
16. NO THING BONUS: Chiptune Runner I (3:54)
17. NO THING BONUS: Grayscale Day (3:24)

DISC 02:
01. Simplest Clerk (voc ver 2019) 2:40
02. The City Is Not Sleeping (voc ver 2019) 2:41
03. Stand In Line For Happiness (voc ver 2019) 3:44
04. In Room 22 (voc ver 2019) 3:28
05. Dark Forest (voc ver 2019) 2:46
06. Alone Without Smile (voc ver 2019) 3:21
07. The Neighbours Are Eating Dinner (voc ver 2019) 3:30
08. Something Wrong In You (voc ver 2019) 3:30
09. The Factories Are Working (voc ver 2019) 2:41
10. In The Castle Made Of Ice (voc ver 2019) 3:16

Have a nice time in broken future of year 1994!
